Version: 1.0-SNAPSHOT

Dependency Information

Apache Maven

<dependency>
  <groupId>org.sonatype.mavenbook</groupId>
  <artifactId>sample-project</artifactId>
  <version>1.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
</dependency>

Apache Buildr

'org.sonatype.mavenbook:sample-project:jar:1.0-SNAPSHOT'

Apache Ivy

<dependency org="org.sonatype.mavenbook" name="sample-project" rev="1.0-SNAPSHOT">
  <artifact name="sample-project" type="jar" />
</dependency>

Groovy Grape

@Grapes(
@Grab(group='org.sonatype.mavenbook', module='sample-project', version='1.0-SNAPSHOT')
)

Gradle/Grails

compile 'org.sonatype.mavenbook:sample-project:1.0-SNAPSHOT'

Scala SBT

libraryDependencies += "org.sonatype.mavenbook" % "sample-project" % "1.0-SNAPSHOT"

Leiningen

[org.sonatype.mavenbook/sample-project "1.0-SNAPSHOT"]
